Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:ASTMManagerComponentStructure@Ensemble ASTM Compnent Structure") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "ASTM Component Structure Definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,! #include EnsEDIASTM set tPath=%request.Get("PATH") set ds=%request.Get("DS") set ss=%request.Get("SS") set iField=%request.Get("FIELD") set cs=%request.Get("CS") set cs1=%request.Get("CS1") set cs1Field=%request.Get("CS1FIELD") set category=$p(cs,":",2) set secondary=$p(cs,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"CS",secondary))) if $data($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary))=0 { write ""_cs_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Write ! If '($L(tPath)) Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !,"
" Write "Path you followed to get to this component structure: "_(tPath)_"
",! Write " " If '($L(cs1Field)) Goto %csp00002 ;{ Write !," Component Structure  '"_($P(cs1,":",2,3))_"', field # "_(cs1Field)_",
",! Write " " %csp00002 ;} Write !," At Field# "_(iField)_"
",! Write " Of Segment Structure  '"_($P(ss,":",2,3))_"',
",! Write " Of Document Structure  '"_($P(ds,":",2,3))_"'" Write "
" Write ! %csp00001 ;} Write !,!,"
" Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write !,"",! Write ! #include EnsEDIASTM If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set struct=$$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary) kill names set name="" for { set name=$o($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary,"names",name)) quit:name="" set names($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary,"names",name))=name } for i=1:1:$LL(struct) { set value=$LI(struct,i) write "" write "" ; description set description=..EscapeHTML($G($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"CS",secondary,i))) write "" ; property name set tPropPath=$S(""=tPath||(""=$get(names(i))):"",1:tPath_"."_$get(names(i))) write "" ; Component structure write "" ; code table set value=$g($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary,"tables",i)) write "" ; alternate description set altdesc=..EscapeHTML($get($$$vaSchemaDescGbl(category,"CS",secondary,i,"alt"))) write "" write "",! } } Write !,!,"
"_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"
ComponentDescriptionProperty NameData StructureCode Table
Alternate
Description
"_i_"",$s(description="":" ",1:description),""_$get(names(i)," ")_"",$s(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$s(value="":" ",1:""_value_""),"",$s(altdesc="":" ",1:altdesc),"
",! Write !,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Component Structures in Category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write !,"

" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble ASTM Component Structure</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
